title: Litecoin Breaks Support!
name: quantguy
contents: Litecoin has slipped from support at $51.92, which has provided support all month. We are currently testing $50.64, which is a level we have mentioned many times here in these reports, and one dedicated readers should remember. This is our expectation for a lower bound, and if this does not hold the next support level is $45.48, deep in the $40 handle. If we are able to pivot from here, we must break through $51.92 again before considering $55.84 again, the upper bound of the range.

title: #USDT.D 4H Chart
name: saviour25
contents: USDT dominance tapped into a 4h area of supply and got heavily rejected from it after taking out the equal highs. I now expect to see some bearish movements and it should retest the support at 7.7%.

title: Oil Finds Support
name: quantguy
contents: Oil has fallen but is finding support in the high $80's. The level $87.21 seems to be providing good support, with two green triangles on the KRI serving as confirmation. The Kovach OBV confirmed a strong rally that took us back to the $90's, just shy of $94. Two attempts to break higher formed a double top which suggested an inability to make new highs and portended the correction. We subsequently fell several handles, but current levels seem strong. Anticipate ranging from here. Aother selloff could take us back to $85.55.

contents:

This drop of a 1000 pips is eminently possible because of the confluence between the S&R, Trendline and Fibonaaci also.

title: #FTMUSDT 6H Chart
name: saviour25
contents: Price reached the support around $0.187 where it bounced from. MACD is bearish , RSI is oversold and EMAs are bearish . I expect price to tap into the 6h supply at $0.205 before moving down again. Waiting for confirmation.

title: EURCAD - Possible Long
name: Macrobriefing
contents:
The euro is dead. But the CAD could be on its way out if there is a global recession and the demand for oil drops heavily.
This idea is more technical in that, I would expect shorts to be trapped and for their stop losses to be places above some swing highs.
My target would be the double top

title: #BTC.D 4H Chart
name: saviour25
contents: Bitcoin dominance retested the 12h supply zone where it got heavily rejected from. I expect it to tap into the 4h demand around 41.2% then continue moving up from there. Waiting for confirmation.

title: Reiterate Short!
name: FaalManage
contents:
Last post I stated dont be surprised if we hit 9.5k on the nasdaq, and that I wont be bullish likely until next year (2024). Listen, the market has nearly always done what I said it was going to do.
Here is some new things:

- the market will likely hit 9.5k by 2. November or 13.november.
- I change my mind about not going bullish until 2024, instead I will buy HEAVILY when it hits 9.5k, i wouldnt even average in, especially if it hits 9.5k as quickly as by 2.november
- You will be in a great position if you do the same.

the potential for the us100 to hit 8000 is there, but... its like a 1% chance, that I wouldn't gamble on.

title: GRAB Analysis
name: Keeleytwj
contents: Price did not play exactly as analyzed last week. I was expecting price to head towards the lows at 2.32. Instead, price went up to mitigate the bearish POI at 2.88 before coming down. My expectations remain unchanged and is expecting the lows at 2.32 to be taken.

title: Preparing for Earnings Season: ESPR
name: MarthaStokesCMT-TechniTrader
contents:
Stocks that are reporting earnings in 3 to 4 weeks can be monitored for pre-earnings runs.

ESPR had momentum runs recently, as marked by the candlestick patterns within the green rectangles in this chart. A shift of sentiment can be seen in the bottoming pattern with Accumulation/Distribution indicators (the area between the blue rectangles).


Often, when an earnings report is going to be great, then the company tries to leak it out subtly. IF earnings were to be negative or below expectations, then CEOs would be warning.

No need to go looking for analyst recommendations, everything you need is in the charts.

Focusing on the charts, rather than on the commentary around the market, will help you find the stocks that will be lucrative for trading this earnings season.

title: Prosus gap filled
name: Trend_Trader_JSE
contents: JSE:PRX has closed its June gap, JSE:NPN is yet to fill its gap. PRX is trading below key MAs, if there's no bounce here, it might go test the recent low at R710.

title: AUDUSD: Will The Sinking Ship Provide Re-Entry ?
name: FX618Analysis
contents:
WHAT A FANTASTIC SHORT POSITION THIS HAS BEEN FOR THE AUDUSD TRADERS WHO CAUGHT THE MOVE @ 0.72000 AFTER THE DEMAND ZONE /SUPPORT BREAK WAS CONFIRMED.

NOW THE QUESTION COMES TO BEG: WOULD AUDUSD PROVIDE THE RE-ENTRY POINT FOR SOME OF US TO ENTER AGAIN AND SHORT IT?

With the FED tightening so aggressively, AUDUSD is bound to sink and the ideal target seems to be 60 cents. Currently the price is not far away from the target, so therefore here we would like for the price to approach 66 cents mark so we can short it.

Have a look at the main chart for full observation on this question. Note: trade is invalid shall the target hit first

Trade Safely & Cautiously
